text: Anthony Marcus "Tony" Shalhoub (born October 9, 1953) is an American movie, stage, television, and voice actor. He is known for his roles as Adrian Monk in Monk, Alexander Minion in the first three Spy Kids movies, and as Luigi in Cars and in Cars 2. Shalhoub has also appeared in plays on stage. == Biography == He was born in Green Bay, Wisconsin on October 9, 1953. Shalhoub is married to Brooke Adams since 1992 and they have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Wisconsin Category:People from Green Bay, Wisconsin
title: Tony Shalhoub
